description.value:
A set of codes from the following dm+d (dictionary of medicines and devices) concept classes that define a medication or medication ingredient that the patient has an allergy or intolerance to:
- VTM – Virtual Therapeutic Moiety - VMP – Virtual Medicinal Product - AMP – Actual Medicinal Product - Ingredient
Where no dm+d or SNOMED coded information is available, a specific code from the nullFlavor Code System can be used instead to indicate this.

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. HL7® FHIR® standard Copyright © 2011+ HL7 The HL7® FHIR® standard is used under the FHIR license. You may obtain a copy of the FHIR license at https://www.hl7.org/fhir/license.html.<br$gt;This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
